meanings.definition: A detailed plan or design, especially one used in construction or engineering.
meanings.sent1: The blueprinted showed all the measurements for the new building.
meanings.sent2: The architect presented the blueprinted to the construction team.
meanings.sent3: The blueprinted for the treehouse included a slide and a secret trapdoor.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a blueprinted, carefully mapping out every detail of the project.
meanings.sent5: The blueprinted of the city's layout was so intricate, it resembled a work of art.

meanings.definition: To make a detailed plan or design for something.
meanings.sent1: She carefully blueprinted the layout of her new garden before planting anything.
meanings.sent2: The engineers blueprinted the design for the new bridge.
meanings.sent3: He blueprinted his weekend schedule to include time for both work and play.
meanings.sent4: The coach blueprinted a winning strategy for the upcoming game.
meanings.sent5: The artist blueprinted the mural on the wall, ensuring every stroke was perfect.
